channel.title: Proverbs Commentary
channel.itunes:author: Church of Greenville
channel.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
channel.itunes:subtitle: Commentary
channel.itunes:summary: The commentary is practical, hard-hitting, current, and spiritual.

item.title: Proverbs 20:5
item.description: Counsel in the heart of man is like deep water; but a man of understanding will draw it out.
item.itunes:author: Church of Greenville
item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: Counsel in the heart of man is like deep water; but a man of understanding will draw it out.
item.itunes:summary: The commentary is practical, hard-hitting, current, and spiritual.

item.title: Proverbs 20:4
item.description: The sluggard will not plow by reason of the cold; therefore shall he beg in harvest, and have nothing.
item.itunes:author: Church of Greenville
item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: The sluggard will not plow by reason of the cold; therefore shall he beg in harvest, and have nothing.
item.itunes:summary: The commentary is practical, hard-hitting, current, and spiritual.

item.title: Proverbs 19:7
item.description: All the brethren of the poor do hate him: how much more do his friends go far from him? he pursueth them with words, yet they are wanting to him.
item.itunes:author: Church of Greenville
item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: All the brethren of the poor do hate him: how much more do his friends go far from him? he pursueth them with words, yet they are wanting to him.
item.itunes:summary: The commentary is practical, hard-hitting, current, and spiritual.

item.title: Proverbs 19:6
item.description: Many will intreat the favour of the prince: and every man is a friend to him that giveth gifts.
item.itunes:author: Church of Greenville
item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: Many will intreat the favour of the prince: and every man is a friend to him that giveth gifts.
item.itunes:summary: The commentary is practical, hard-hitting, current, and spiritual.

item.title: Proverbs 19:5
item.description: A false witness shall not be unpunished, and he that speaketh lies shall not escape.
item.itunes:author: Church of Greenville
item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: A false witness shall not be unpunished, and he that speaketh lies shall not escape.
item.itunes:summary: The commentary is practical, hard-hitting, current, and spiritual.

item.title: Proverbs 18:12
item.description: Before destruction the heart of man is haughty, and before honour is humility.
item.itunes:author: Church of Greenville
item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: Before destruction the heart of man is haughty, and before honour is humility.
item.itunes:summary: The commentary is practical, hard-hitting, current, and spiritual.

item.title: Proverbs 18:11
item.description: The rich man's wealth is his strong city, and as an high wall in his own conceit.
item.itunes:author: Church of Greenville
item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: The rich man's wealth is his strong city, and as an high wall in his own conceit.
item.itunes:summary: The commentary is practical, hard-hitting, current, and spiritual.

item.title: Proverbs 18:10
item.description: The name of the LORD is a strong tower: the righteous runneth into it, and is safe.
item.itunes:author: Church of Greenville
item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: The name of the LORD is a strong tower: the righteous runneth into it, and is safe.
item.itunes:summary: The commentary is practical, hard-hitting, current, and spiritual.

item.title: Proverbs 17:8
item.description: A gift is as a precious stone in the eyes of him that hath it: whithersoever it turneth, it prospereth.
item.itunes:author: Church of Greenville
item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: A gift is as a precious stone in the eyes of him that hath it: whithersoever it turneth, it prospereth.
item.itunes:summary: The commentary is practical, hard-hitting, current, and spiritual.

item.title: Proverbs 17:7
item.description: Excellent speech becometh not a fool: much less do lying lips a prince.
item.itunes:author: Church of Greenville
item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: Excellent speech becometh not a fool: much less do lying lips a prince.
item.itunes:summary: The commentary is practical, hard-hitting, current, and spiritual.

item.title: Proverbs 17:6
item.description: Children's children are the crown of old men; and the glory of children are their fathers.
item.itunes:author: Church of Greenville
item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: Children's children are the crown of old men; and the glory of children are their fathers.
item.itunes:summary: The commentary is practical, hard-hitting, current, and spiritual.

item.title: Proverbs 16:3
item.description: Commit thy works unto the LORD, and thy thoughts shall be established.

item.itunes:subtitle: Commit thy works unto the LORD, and thy thoughts shall be established.

item.title: Proverbs 16:2
item.description: All the ways of a man are clean in his own eyes; but the LORD weigheth the spirits.

item.title: Proverbs 16:1

item.itunes:subtitle: The preparations of the heart in man, and the answer of the tongue, is from the LORD.

item.title: Proverbs 15:3

item.title: Proverbs 15:2
item.description: The tongue of the wise useth knowledge aright: but the mouth of fools poureth out foolishness.

item.title: Proverbs 15:1
item.description: A soft answer turneth away wrath: but grievous words stir up anger.

item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: A soft answer turneth away wrath: but grievous words stir up anger.

item.title: Proverbs 14:1
item.description: Every wise woman buildeth her house: but the foolish plucketh it down with her hands.

item.title: Proverbs 14:35
item.description: The king's favour is toward a wise servant: but his wrath is against him that causeth shame.

item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: The king's favour is toward a wise servant: but his wrath is against him that causeth shame.

item.title: Proverbs 14:34
item.description: Righteousness exalteth a nation: but sin is a reproach to any people.

item.itunes:subtitle: Righteousness exalteth a nation: but sin is a reproach to any people.

item.title: Proverbs 13:11
item.description: Wealth gotten by vanity shall be diminished: but he that gathereth by labour shall increase.
item.itunes:author: Church of Greenville
item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: Wealth gotten by vanity shall be diminished: but he that gathereth by labour shall increase.
item.itunes:summary: The commentary is practical, hard-hitting, current, and spiritual.

item.title: Proverbs 13:10
item.description: Only by pride cometh contention: but with the well advised is wisdom.
item.itunes:author: Church of Greenville
item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: Only by pride cometh contention: but with the well advised is wisdom.
item.itunes:summary: The commentary is practical, hard-hitting, current, and spiritual.

item.title: Proverbs 13:9
item.description: The light of the righteous rejoiceth: but the lamp of the wicked shall be put out.

item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: The light of the righteous rejoiceth: but the lamp of the wicked shall be put out.
item.itunes:summary: The commentary is practical, hard-hitting, current, and spiritual.

item.title: Proverbs 12:8
item.description: A man shall be commended according to his wisdom: but he that is of a perverse heart shall be despised.

item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: A man shall be commended according to his wisdom: but he that is of a perverse heart shall be despised.

item.title: Proverbs 12:7
item.description: The wicked are overthrown, and are not: but the house of the righteous shall stand.

item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: The wicked are overthrown, and are not: but the house of the righteous shall stand.
item.itunes:summary: The commentary is practical, hard-hitting, current, and spiritual.

item.title: Proverbs 12:6
item.description: The words of the wicked are to lie in wait for blood: but the mouth of the upright shall deliver them.

item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: The words of the wicked are to lie in wait for blood: but the mouth of the upright shall deliver them.

item.title: Proverbs 11:5
item.description: The righteousness of the perfect shall direct his way: but the wicked shall fall by his own wickedness.

item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: The righteousness of the perfect shall direct his way: but the wicked shall fall by his own wickedness.

item.title: Proverbs 11:4
item.description: Riches profit not in the day of wrath: but righteousness delivereth from death.

item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC
item.itunes:subtitle: Riches profit not in the day of wrath: but righteousness delivereth from death.

item.title: Proverbs 11:3
item.description: The integrity of the upright shall guide them: but the perverseness of transgressors shall destroy them.

item.itunes:keywords: Bible, KJV, King James Version, Plain Preaching, Wisdom, The Church of Greenville, Church, Greenville, SC

item.title: Proverbs 10:4

item.description: Treasures of wickedness profit nothing: but righteousness delivereth from death.
